Text: Thankyou so much for sharing your collection with us Mr Gordon. I am in the process of downloading all of your Columbo series and have watched the completed downloads with great enjoyment. It is of course taking a while to complete the downloads but well worth it. Thanks again for your time and effort.

You should change your title, Because COLUMBO's first season was 1971-1972.

The first TV movie with Peter Falk playing the Columbo character, however, was "Prescription: Murder", which was filmed in 1967 and didn't air until February 1968.
10/10!! Jgordon, You're the man!  ....well  columbo's the man, but after him you're right there. wicked picture and sound.  Time to get cracking with the rest of 'em now.  a big THANKS!
Great release! Also, external ENG subs are included. Perfect! Thanks a lot, Mr Gordon. Greetings from Spain!
ThanQ U So muchhh.. u'r the man
